attributes.action: Zero tax on wind turbines and bio diesel and Develop Hydrogen powered vehicles the technology is there use it and big vehicles will clean the atmosphere with the oxygen it produces all info on web and the USA are going to leave us behind call me if you want help to develop it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All the technology is there to make and develop new and convert existing vehicles to run on hydrogen (browns Gas) or add hydrogen to existing fuels the exhaust fumes produced by hydrogen are completely clean and will put more oxygen into the atmosphere
And also why does tax have to so high on Bio Diesel !!
and make zero tax on wind turbines.
